sections.title: What is N26 and how does the bonus work
content: N26 is a digital bank with a European license, offering a free online account with an Italian IBAN.
With the Standard plan, there are no opening costs or monthly fees. You can manage everything from your smartphone.
Upon registration, you receive a virtual debit card that you can use immediately with Google Pay and Apple Pay.
After making a purchase of at least ‚Ç¨15 with your N26 card (virtual or physical), you will receive a ‚Ç¨15 bonus directly into your account.
You can also earn ‚Ç¨15 for every person who registers using your referral link and completes the bonus requirements.

sections.title: Main requirements
content: Make a purchase of at least ‚Ç¨15 using your N26 card (virtual or physical).
The card can be used on Amazon, e-commerce sites, or for mobile recharges. PayPal transactions are excluded.
A physical card is optional and costs ‚Ç¨10 one-time, but the virtual card is free and usable immediately.
The bonus is credited within 2-3 business days, up to a maximum of 60 days.
Each valid referral is worth ‚Ç¨15, with a total annual cap of ‚Ç¨1,500.
Identity verification is required with a valid document (ID card, driver‚Äôs license, or passport) and a selfie.
Available to residents aged 18 or older.

sections.title: Step-by-step guide
content: 1. Sign up using the referral link shown on this page next to the N26 logo.
2. Enter your personal details, upload your ID (front and back), and follow the instructions for the selfie verification.
3. Once your account is verified, make a purchase of at least ‚Ç¨15 using your N26 virtual card, Google Pay, or Apple Pay.
